title: keen 2 help!
content:
basically the yellow key in the bottom left hand corner in this picture...How do you get it? Its too high for pogo and there is no other way in.
[img]http://www.keengalaxy.com/images/zoom/RYDOMR/CK2LV14.jpg[/img]

thanks.

title: ooh
content:
SCRUBS!! :-D

Edit: Release the Scrub wandering around by the Green keycard; follow him on his route around the level... eventually he'll climb the wall the Yellow keycard is up--jump on him, ride up to the top, claim your card, and fall back down. Cake!

Edit again: Make sure to NOT take both Vorticola cans just before freeing the Scrub--otherwise he will march around towards the exit, rather than falling down to head towards Yellow.

title: Re: ooh
content:
oops I just figured it out when I noticed your reply, my problem was I took the soda which you mentioned before I went to that so I forgot they were there! lol
thanks,
